Class Scroll

  • public class Scroll
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the services that is used to navigate the page to scroll up and scroll down

      • up

        public boolean up(int scrollUpRange)
        Purpose : This method is used to scroll the page up in a web page
        Parameters:
        scrollUpRange - : This parameter should be given by the user for e.g : 100 : this means vertical up by 100 pixels,will go 100 pixels up in a page
        Returns:
        : Returns true if Successful or Returns false

      • down

        public boolean down(int scrollDownRange)
        Purpose : This method is used to scroll the page down in a web page
        Parameters:
        scrollDownRange - : This parameter should be given by the user for e.g : 100 : this means vertical down by 100 pixels,will go 100 pixels down in a page
        Returns:
        : Returns true if Successful or Returns false

      • toView

        Purpose : This method is used to scroll automatically to the web element
        Parameters:

        : Returns true if Successful or Returns false
